values.description:
Makes Ignition Launch compatible with [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/451/improvements-to-gui-configuration/diff#comment-126048941) ign-gazebo PR.

Since the whole point of the `GazeboGui` plugin is to load the plugins specified in the launch file, I'm not adding support for querying plugins from the SDF world or to use Ignition Gazebo's default config file. Instead, I'm creating `ign-launch`'s own default config file. See more details on the header.
values.title: Default GUI config for Launch

summary.raw:
Makes Ignition Launch compatible with [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/451/improvements-to-gui-configuration/diff#comment-126048941) ign-gazebo PR.

Since the whole point of the `GazeboGui` plugin is to load the plugins specified in the launch file, I'm not adding support for querying plugins from the SDF world or to use Ignition Gazebo's default config file. Instead, I'm creating `ign-launch`'s own default config file. See more details on the header.
summary.html:
Makes Ignition Launch compatible with this ign-gazebo PR.

Since the whole point of the GazeboGui plugin is to load the plugins specified in the launch file, I'm not adding support for querying plugins from the SDF world or to use Ignition Gazebo's default config file. Instead, I'm creating ign-launch's own default config file. See more details on the header.

values.description: The current debs on the stable repo don't contain pull request #55. We need to make a new stable release from this branch. I bumped the patch version so we don't collide with the existing debs.
values.title: 2.0.0 stable

summary.raw: The current debs on the stable repo don't contain pull request #55. We need to make a new stable release from this branch. I bumped the patch version so we don't collide with the existing debs.

values.description:
This is broken off pull request #45 and goes with this `ign-gazebo` PR:

#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/497/

Can be tested like this:

1. `ign launch gazebo_plugins.ign`
1. Close after a while
1. Check that both log files ended up in `/tmp/ign-launch-demo`
1. `ign launch gazebo_plugins.ign` again
1. Close afyer a while
1. Check that both log files in `/tmp/ign-launch-demo` are newer now
values.title: Log overwrite

summary.html:
This is broken off pull request #45 and goes with this ign-gazebo PR:

#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/497/

Can be tested like this:

  1. ign launch gazebo_plugins.ign
  2. Close after a while
  3. Check that both log files ended up in /tmp/ign-launch-demo
  4. ign launch gazebo_plugins.ign again
  5. Close afyer a while
  6. Check that both log files in /tmp/ign-launch-demo are newer now

values.description:
Goes with this PR: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/500/

Can be tested like this:

1. `ign launch gazebo_plugins.ign`
1. Close after a while
1. Check that there is a zip file `/tmp/ign-launch-demo.zip`, and no `/tmp/ign-launch-demo` directory.
values.title: Log compress
